Steve.name: Steve Riesenberg
Steve.title: Founder & CEO
Steve.siterole: webmaster, developer, engineer, architect, copywriter, designer, contributor
Steve.intro: I'm an author, developer, father, musician, and everything in between. In 2016, I founded InSource Software...
Steve.tagline: I'm an author, developer, father, musician, and everything in between. In 2016, I founded InSource Software with the goal of making software development fun again, and to create a sustainable model for including the customer in the process. Oh, and building great software. That too...

Laurie.name: Laurie Riesenberg
Laurie.title: Designer & CMO
Laurie.intro: I'm the graphic designer and marketing brains for the company. When not working on new logo styles and graphics...
Laurie.tagline: I'm the graphic designer and marketing brains for the company. When not working on new logo styles and graphics, I'm a homeschool teacher and mother of two, as well as a musician and avid hobbyist. I also run an online business where I design and sell printable resources to teachers, as well as digital art and photography.
